title: The Blue Jays are World Series-bound! Inside the Game 7 instant classic
content: Toronto is going to the World Series and ending its 32-year drought. We've got all the Game 7 action you missed.

title: Springer HR sends Blue Jays to 1st WS since '93
content: With Toronto trailing Seattle by two runs in Game 7 on Monday night at Rogers Centre, George Springer hit a three-run home run that rallied the Blue Jays past the Mariners 4-3 and into the World Series.

title: Cops: Ex-RB Martin died in custody after break-in
content: Former NFL All-Pro running back Doug Martin died in police custody after he was involved in a break-in at an Oakland residence, police said.

title: Buccaneers lose WR Evans to broken collarbone
content: Buccaneers receiver Mike Evans suffered a broken collarbone and concussion Monday night at Detroit and will be out most of the year, coach Todd Bowles said.

title: Campbell: 'No looking back' after Gibbs' breakout
content: Lions running back Jahmyr Gibbs had two touchdowns and a career-best 218 scrimmage yards in Monday night's win over the Buccaneers.

title: Sources: Graham, Eagles finalizing deal to reunite
content: Defensive end Brandon Graham has decided to come out of retirement and is finalizing a deal to rejoin the Eagles this week, sources told ESPN's Adam Schefter on Monday.

title: Nicklaus awarded $50 million in defamation suit
content: A Florida jury on Monday awarded Jack Nicklaus $50 million in his defamation lawsuit against Nicklaus Companies, which is owned by billionaire banker Howard Milstein.

title: Jays SS Bichette (knee) says he'll return for WS
content: Blue Jays shortstop Bo Bichette said "I'll be ready" when asked if he'll be joining his team for its first World Series appearance since 1993.

title: Broncos LB Greenlaw suspended 1 game by NFL
content: Broncos linebacker Dre Greenlaw was suspended one game by the NFL for unsportsmanlike conduct toward a referee following Sunday's game against the Giants.

title: Seahawks overcome stubborn Texans, create three-way tie atop the NFC West
content: The Seahawks joined the 49ers and Rams at 5-2 by outlasting the Texans, who couldn't take advantage of four Seattle turnovers.

title: Blue Jays-Dodgers World Series preview: Which team has the edge?
content: It's the defending champs vs. a franchise that hasn't won in three decades. Here's your first look at an L.A.-Toronto showdown.

title: What's next for OKC? Three paths forward for SGA and the champs
content: ESPN analyst Zach Kram breaks down whether Oklahoma City is past, in or entering the best version of its roster.

content: What do you need to know for all 30 NBA teams for the 2025-26 season? Here are the stars, stats and bets ahead of opening night.

content: Parity has been the theme of the season, making it hard to know what's what. Bill Connelly is here to help.

title: Barnwell: We thought we knew the Chiefs, Bills, Jaguars and Colts -- but we were wrong
content: Remember when we thought the Chiefs' offense was toast? That the Colts would fizzle? The Jaguars would be OK, and the Bills were an AFC lock? Well ...

content: We sized up overreactions, including fantasy football. Did the Vikings err at QB, and are the Chiefs the AFC favorite?

title: UFC's most dominant heavyweight ever hasn't even fought for the title
content: Tom Aspinall isn't the greatest or most accomplished UFC heavyweight, but his suffocating résumé is hard to deny.

title: Time for Liverpool to panic? Plus: Barça win lucky, Bayern claim Der Klassiker, more
content: Man United's win at Liverpool shows the extent of the Reds' issues, though United aren't in the clear yet. Also, Bayern win Der Klassiker, Barcelona get lucky ahead of the Clasico, and more.

title: How Marcus Rashford has revitalized his career at Barcelona
content: At 27, Rashford should be entering his prime. And his move to Barça has seemingly reinvigorated his career.

content: Highlighting available free agent options after a weekend of surprising performances ahead of Week 8.

content: Bo Nix, A.J. Brown and Ja'Marr Chase led the way in Week 7, while Caleb Williams and Ashton disappointed.

title: 'Checkdown Charlie' to 'State Farm' actor: Who said it? Take Week 7's NFL quote quiz
content: Week 7 in the NFL offered up-front quotes and self-reflection. Put your knowledge to the test with our quote quiz.

title: NFL Week 7's top performance? Check the fan-voted 'Himmy' Award leaderboard
content: Joe Flacco, Micah Parsons, Jonathan Taylor or Christian McCaffrey -- who deserves Week 7's "Himmy" Award?

title: How another round of top-10 losses shakes up playoff, bowl matchups
content: We project who will play where through the national title game as we move into the season's second half.

title: From zero to 33: How the Broncos pulled off an unlikely fourth-quarter comeback win
content: The Broncos went from being shut out for three quarters to scoring 33 in the fourth for a win that won't be forgotten.

title: Ranking men's college basketball impact newcomers: The top 50 transfers, freshmen
content: Who will have the biggest impact in their first season with a team? Here are the top newcomers for 2025-26.

title: NFL Week 8 betting lines: Colts huge favorites; Rodgers, Steelers underdogs to Packers
content: Aaron Rodgers and the Steelers are home underdogs to the Packers, and Bears-Ravens has the highest total for Week 8.

title: First bets for Week 8: Revenge for Rodgers, a Giants rebound, more
content: What lines offered immediate value once odds came out? Here are four early bets and a futures wager to track.

title: WWE Raw takeaways: Rollins stripped, Jey Uso yeets his twin for a title shot
content: An injury will keep Seth Rollins out of the ring for 'quite a while,' putting his world title up for grabs.

title: How will McLaren combat Verstappen's surging title threat? Keep calm
content: Max Verstappen is taking large chunks out of the once-insurmountable championship leads of Oscar Piastri and Lando Norris. Can McLaren right the ship?

title: MLS Cup playoffs: Bet against Messi, Miami at your own peril
content: The regular season is in the rearview mirror and the playoffs are upon us, so which postseason contenders are best placed for a run to MLS Cup?

title: NWSL: Marta has Orlando looking ominous again
content: Marta's was in fine form at the weekend, helping Orlando to a win that catapults the Pride up our list.

title: Draft guide: All you need to win your league this season
content: We've got everything you need to help you prepare for and execute a successful draft, all in one place.

title: Transfer rumors, news: Chelsea to go back in for Spain striker Samu
content: Chelsea will make a fresh attempt to sign FC Porto's Spain international striker Samu Agehowa. Transfer Talk has the latest news and rumors.

title: HMDA registers 245% rise in permit fee collection this year; skyscrapers lead growth
content: In a significant turnaround, HMDA has reported a surge in building permissions and revenue this year, driven largely by the booming multi-storeyed building sector. Total collections reach ₹1,225 crore

title: Flash floods inundate houses, shop at Cherupuzha as heavy rains batter hilly areas of Kannur in Kerala
content: Local residents said water levels rose rapidly following hours of intense rainfall in upper catchment areas

title: K-Rail route likely to be revised, says CPI(M) Kerala secretary M.V. Govindan
content: Govindan says a new approach is necessary since the Centre has not yet approved the existing proposal

title: Police Commemoration Day observed in Villupuram, Cuddalore, Kallakurichi
content: The Police Commemoration Day is observed on October 21 every year to pay respects to the 10 policemen who were killed by Chinese troops in an ambush at Hot Springs in Ladakh in 1959.

title: Heavy rains likely in Kerala as low-pressure area intensifies; orange alert for five districts on October 21
content: New weather system is likely to trigger heavy to very heavy rainfall across Kerala, especially in Ghat regions

title: Principal, teachers of Bengaluru private school booked on charge of assaulting Class 5 student
content: When questioned, the school management allegedly justified their act stating:  “This is how we discipline in our school. If you don’t like it, take the TC and leave“

title: Air quality dips in Kolkata and Howrah after Deepavali celebrations; noise limit violated in certain places
content: Environmentalists say rules and regulations remain on paper and people fail to implement them every year

title: Telangana CM Revanth Reddy pledges full support to families of police personnel killed in line of duty
content: The Chief Minister announced an ex-gratia of ₹1 crore to family of constable E Pramod Kumar — who was recently killed in Nizamabad — along with his last drawn salary until retirement, a government job for a family member, and a 300-yard house plot

title: Tamil Nadu CM Stalin participates in Police Commemoration Day
content: This is the first time the Chief Minister of Tamil Nadu has participated in the Police Commemoration Day event.

title: Trump brushed aside MEA's attempts at denial: Congress after U.S. President repeats 'Russian oil import' claims
content: The Congress on October 18, 2025 had said the PM suddenly becomes a "mauni baba" whenever Donald Trump states that he stopped India-Pakistan conflict or that India will reduce its oil imports from Russia

title: Deepavali truce? Kiran Mazumdar-Shaw visits Karnataka DCM D.K. Shivakumar at his residence
content: The meeting has turned heads as it comes after a bitter exchange between the two after Ms Shaw’s criticism on the poor state of infrastructure in Bengaluru.

title: Kerala School Athletic Meet set to kick off in Thiruvananthapuram on October 22
content: Chief Minister Pinarayi Vijayan to flag off field and track competitions at a curtain-raiser event at Kerala University Stadium on Tuesday evening

title: Parvez Rasool, J&K’s first international cricketer, retires
content: He said that though he was stepping away from professional cricket, he would continue to “play for passion” and guide youngsters

title: FIR against ex-Punjab DGP, his wife in connection with their son’s death
content: Haryana Police filed an FIR against former Punjab DGP Mohammad Mustafa and others following the suspicious death of his son, Aqil Akhtar, with allegations of murder and conspiracy surfacing

title: ‘Moderate’ air quality recorded in Kochi after Deepavali
content: Overall AQI was 83 in Kochi around 12 noon on Tuesday, as per data available under AQI tracker in Google Maps

title: Well-marked low pressure area forms over Bay of Bengal, to trigger intense rainfall in Tamil Nadu
content: The Regional Meteorological Centre (RMC), Chennai has sounded orange and yellow alerts for various parts of the State for the next four days

title: Kerala CM inaugurates new Palayam market in Kozhikode amid protests
content: Pinarayi Vijayan criticises ‘attitude of opposing projects that are meant for the betterment of society’

title: Maoism to become history soon: Rajnath Singh
content: “We resolved not to let this problem persist any longer. The way our police, CRPF, BSF and local administration worked together in an organised manner is commendable," says Defence Minister

title: Two cars destroyed in blaze triggered by firecrackers in Mumbai
content: No person was injured in the blaze reported to the fire brigade at 11.33 p.m. on October 20 at the Neelyog Vedanta building near Arogyadayi Hospital, a civic official said

title: Mettur Dam reaches full capacity for seventh time this year
content: 30,000 cusecs of surplus water is being released into Cauvery river as on October 21. Flood alert has been issued to 11 districts in the delta region.

title: Operation Sindoor, Naxalism defeat, GST reforms establish India as global symbol of stability: PM Modi
content: PM Modi’s Diwali message highlights India’s triumph over Naxalism and GST reforms, celebrating national unity and global stability

title: Watch: This Tamil Nadu village celebrates bats as protectors
content: In Royandapuram, Tamil Nadu, silence reigns during festivals—not out of restraint, but reverence. Home to 1,500 sacred bats, this village believes these creatures bring prosperity and protection.

title: Watch: Ola founder Bhavish Aggarwal booked over engineer’s death
content: A case was filed against Ola Electric founder Bhavish Aggarwal and senior officials after the death of 38-year-old engineer K. Aravind, who allegedly faced workplace harassment and unpaid dues.

title: Air quality remains ‘stable’ in Kerala capital after Deepavali
content: Kerala capital’s average AQI recorded at Plamoodu was 76 on Tuesday morning, with air quality returning to ‘stable’ category, whereas it was 168 AQI (moderate category) at the same time on Monday

title: Naidu pays tributes to Police Martyrs, vows full support to maintain law and order
content: Mr. Naidu said that maintaining proper law and order is essential for attracting investments and fostering confidence among industries

title: Delhi’s air pollution 15 times WHO limit; parts of city reel under ‘severe’ pollution
content: Delhi ‘most polluted’ major city in the world on Tuesday (October 21, 2025) morning, according to IQAir’s (a Swiss air quality technology company) live data for over 120 cities

title: India rains LIVE: Low pressure area forms over Bay of Bengal, likely to cause heavy rainfall in Tamil Nadu
content: The India Meteorological Department (IMD) on October 20 said a low pressure area is likely to form over the Bay of Bengal

title: 11 districts in Kerala brace for intense rains on October 21
content: The IMD has issued a yellow alert for Pathanamthitta, Alappuzha, Kottayam, Ernakulam, Idukki, Thrissur, Palakkad, Malappuram, Kozhikode and Wayanad

title: Govt Medical College, hospital will come up in Puttur at any cost, reiterates Chief Minister
content: Siddaramaiah appeals to people of Dakshina Kannada to elect Congress to power in all eight Assembly segments in the next election

title: Truckers, commercial vehicle operators call for 4-day strike to protest bad roads in Mizoram
content: The blockade will be spearheaded by the Kolasib unit of the Mizoram Tipper Association (MTA) and Joint Action Committee (JAC) of drivers and owners of commercial vehicles in Kolasib town

title: 33 nominations filed for bypolls in two Assembly segments in Jammu and Kashmir
content: The officials said 20 candidates, including eight independents filed their nominations from Budgam constituency where National Conference has fielded former minister Aga Syed Mehmood Al-Mousvi, BJP Aga Syed Mohsin Mosvi and PDP Aga Syed Muntazir Mehdi

title: Bihar Assembly polls: RJD's Sasaram candidate arrested after filing nomination
content: This was the third incident of contesting candidates of the constituents of INDIA bloc being arrested after filing their nomination papers.

title: Bihar Assembly polls: Filing of nomination papers over; INDIA bloc looks fractured
content: The Congress is contesting altogether 61 seats, five less than the number it had contested in 2020, when it had won only 19 and the dismal strike rate was blamed for the inability of Mahagathbandhan to win a majority

title: European Council approves ‘New Strategic EU-India Agenda’, efforts to conclude FTA
content: The council called on the European Commission to take forward the articulation and implementation of this ‘New Strategic EU-India Agenda’ on the basis of the priorities set out in the Joint Communication last month

title: Dibrugarh-bound Air India Express flight returns to Guwahati after developing technical snag
content: A different aircraft was arranged and flight IX-1186 flew from Guwahati and reached Dibrugarh at 6:20 p.m.,” an official said.

title: Low pressure brewing over Bay of Bengal, Odisha to receive rainfall for next three days: IMD
content: According to the IMD, the weather system is expected to move west-northwestwards and intensify into a depression over central parts of south Bay of Bengal and adjoining westcentral Bay of Bengal over the next 48 hours

title: NC will fight Assembly bypolls in Nagrota, Budgam on public issues: J&K Deputy CM
content: We will fight the elections on the issues being faced by the people and restoration of statehood is the biggest issue for us, says J&K Deputy Chief Minister

title: Assam Police team reaches Singapore to probe Zubeen Garg's death
content: The Assam Police’s SIT is collaborating with the Singapore counterpart to investigate the singer-songwriter’s death

title: Heavy rain lashes high ranges of Kerala; orange alert in four districts
content: The high ranges of southern Thiruvananthapuram and northern Kozhikode districts experienced widespread rains and overcast climate throughout the day

title: India rapidly emerging as global hub for services exports: NSE
content: "India will be to services, what China has been to manufacturing. It is emerging as global hub for services exports," NSE chief economist Tirthankar Patnaik said

title: Jammu and Kashmir bypolls: NC, BJP candidates file nominations for Budgam
content: While the National Conference has named veteran Shia leader Aga Mehmood as its candidate, the BJP has fielded Syed Mohsin. The PDP has also announced its candidate, Aga Muntazir Mehdi

title: Karnataka Deputy CM Shivakumar asks BJP for evidence on fundraising allegations ahead of Bihar polls
content: BJP MPs Jagadish Shettar and B.Y. Raghavanedra alleged that the ruling Congress was involved in fundraising for the Bihar elections, leading to increase in corruption in the State

title: CM Adityanath offers prayers at Hanuman Garhi Temple in Ayodhya
content: CM Adityanath offered prayers at the Ram Darbar for the progress of the State and for the welfare of the public, the Uttar Pradesh government said in a statement

title: Case against Ola Electric founder, senior officials after death of employee
content: The company statement also said that “Ola Electric is fully cooperating with the authorities in their ongoing investigation and remains committed to maintaining a safe, respectful, and supportive workplace for all employees,” the statement added

title: Bihar Assembly polls: JMM says it won’t contest, blames ‘political conspiracy’ by Congress-RJD for decision
content: Senior JMM leader Sudivya Kumar said his party will review the alliance in Jharkhand with the Congress and RJD, and give a befitting reply to the “snub”

title: Sabarimala gold ‘theft’: SIT to submit first progress report to Kerala HC
content: Officials said the report will cover the current status of the investigation, including the arrest of Unnikrishnan Potti, who sponsored the gold plating

title: Bihar Assembly polls: RJD releases list of 143 candidates, 24 of them are women
content: The list was released hours before the filing of nomination papers for the second and final phase was to be over

title: IMD issues 'cyclone alert' in Andaman & Nicobar Islands
content: “Local port warnings have been issued in the wake of the weather system, which is likely to cause heavy rainfall till October 23,” officials said

title: Police constable’s killer Riyaz shot dead in police encounter at Nizamabad hospital
content: Riyaz, who was taken into custody on October 19, had been wanted in connection with the murder of 42-year-old constable Pramod, who was stabbed to death while escorting him to a police station in Nizamabad on October 18

title: Early northeast monsoon onset creates ‘triple whammy’ in South India
content: An important problem arises for Tamil Nadu and Kerala when the two phases of the monsoon overlap or if both States experience intense rainfall simultaneously

title: Congress releases another list of 6 candidates for Bihar polls; 60 names declared so far
content: The Congress's list was announced post-midnight, even as a formal seat-sharing deal has alluded the Mahagathbandhan

title: Trump says India to pay ‘massive tariffs’ if it continues to buy Russian oil
content: “I spoke with Prime Minister Modi of India, and he said he's not going to be doing the Russian oil thing,” the U.S. President said

title: Peaceful dialogue only solution to ethnic conflict: Manipur Police chief
content: The DGP said, "These are very challenging times, but we have been trying to tackle them with the best possible strength, and with the cooperation of everyone”

title: Ambulance set on fire amid SDPI-CPI(M) clash in Thiruvananthapuram
content: Tension erupted in the area after SDPI activists allegedly attacked a local CPI(M) leader on Sunday  evening, says police

title: Tej Pratap booked for MCC violation while filing nomination for Bihar polls
content: According to the police, the Janshakti Janta Dal chief used an SUV, bearing a police logo and a beacon light, during a procession for submitting his documents in Mahua

title: PM Modi celebrates Deepavali aboard INS Vikrant, hails armed forces’ unity in Operation Sindoor
content: INS Vikrant is not just a warship but is a testimony to 21st-century India's hard work, talent, impact and commitment, Mr. Modi said

title: India’s jet-lagged fighter fleet
content: Over the last decade, the Indian Air Force has been asking for a new generation of fighter jets. With the MiG-21 now decommissioned, the number of squadrons that fly fighter jets is 70% lower than the sanctioned strength. Delay in indigenous manufacture and international procurement is the reason behind the ‘immediate gap’

title: Better future for India in medicine means embracing immunology today
content: The strength of Indian medicine has traditionally been its clinical acumen and ability to manage vast numbers of patients. However, to truly participate in and benefit from the coming age of immuno-medicine, a robust foundation in immunology education is not a luxury: it’s an urgent necessity

title: Both YSRCP and TDP are equally destructive forces, alleges Congress leader Thulasi Reddy
content: While the YSRCP government left the State buried in debt, crime, liquor, drugs, and cannabis, the coalition government made things worse by taking record loans of ₹1.5 lakh crore in 16 months and burdening electricity users with ₹15,480 crore in surcharges

title: Container Road still a death trap for motorists
content: Traffic congestion on Goshree bridges, lack of adequate streetlights and alleged unscientific road and junction designs are cited by local people as major causes behind accidents on Container Terminal Road

title: TNSDA completes the first phase of underwater survey off the Poompuhar coast
content: A team of 10 divers carried out the survey, which began on September 20 and continued for 12 days. The department is planning one more phase of exploration when the sea conditions are favourable

title: Karnataka invites ETH Zurich’s quantum pioneer to next Quantum India Summit in Bengaluru
content: The State government has deepened its international scientific engagement with ETH Zurich — one of the world’s leading institutions in quantum science and technology — through a visit to the ETH Quantum Center and an invitation for its leadership to participate in the Quantum India Summit 2026 in Bengaluru.

title: Trinamool leaders follow Abhishek, donate for flood relief in North Bengal
content: The WB government has sought donations under West Bengal State Disaster Management Authority (WBSDMA) Fund for flood relief. Abhishek Banerjee donated ₹1 lakh for flood relief, calling upon everyone to rise to the occasion and help rebuild shattered lives.

title: NC, PDP, BJP field members of the Shia clergy for J&K Assembly bypolls
content: This is the first time that Budgam, which has a sizable Shia population, will see three candidates from the Shia clergy contesting the by-polls

title: DGP appointment row: second contempt petition moved against Tamil Nadu government
content: In his petition, Madurai-based rights activist Henri Tiphagne says the action of the State was violative of the guidelines laid down by the Supreme Court in the Prakash Singh case

title: Mullaperiyar dam opened; Idukki and Theni face rain havoc
content: Man killed as intense overnight rain inundates roads and homes, triggers mudslides in Idukki; Tamil Nadu’s Theni district bordering Idukki too bore brunt of downpour; farmer dies in Virudhunagar after being washed away on flooded causeway

title: West Bengal BJP leader labels protesters ‘Bangladeshis who will be expelled in SIR’
content: The Nandigram BJP MLA who has been drumming up support for the Special Intensive Revision said that names of the ‘Bangladeshi Muslims’ who were behind the attack on his vehicle will be removed from the voter list after the SIR

title: Do cash transfers build women’s agency in India?
content: There is a need to ensure that women do not only receive money but also control, grow, and sustain it for their own advancement

title: 146 species recorded in Kaziranga bird survey
content: The avian count timed with Kati Bihu was conducted across five key locations of the Kaziranga National Park and the adjoining Laokhowa Wildlife Sanctuary

title: Bihar Assembly polls: PM Modi to launch election campaign from Karpoorigram
content: Bihar BJP State president Dilip Jaiswal said that PM would address an election rally in Begusarai on October 24

title: Low-pressure area likely over southeast Bay of Bengal by October 21: RMC
content: Under its influence, enhanced rainfall activity is likely over north Tamil Nadu and Puducherry between October 22 and 24

title: Fronts without faces: grand alliance, NDA reluctant to name CM candidate
content: Congress has not confirmed RJD ally Tejashwi Yadav as mahagathbandhan’s CM face; BJP has not confirmed CM and JD(U) chief Nitish Kumar as NDA’s choice; RJD, Congress candidates to clash in a dozen seats

title: Dynasts matter when it comes to Bihar elections, list of parties full of politicians' kin
content: Experts say that no party in Bihar can claim moral superiority on this ground as far as dynasts entering politics is concerned

title: Giriraj Singh’s remarks against Muslims trigger political row in Bihar
content: Union Minister says he does not want votes of ‘namak haram’; Opposition accuses BJP of polarising voters ahead of Assembly elections

title: PM Modi to face Quad, BRICS leaders at ASEAN meet next week
content: While New Delhi has yet to confirm the Prime Minister’s visit for the ASEAN-East Asia Summit, the Malaysian Foreign Minister said he would attend

title: ‘Break her legs’: Pragya Thakur tells parents to punish daughters for meeting ‘non-Hindus’
content: Former Bhopal MP Pragya Singh Thakur has sparked controversy with remarks advising parents to physically punish daughters who visit non-Hindu homes, even suggesting "breaking their legs." Speaking at a religious event, Thakur urged parents to enforce obedience and values, stating that punishment is necessary for their well-being.

title: Items unverified for 40 yrs: Ivory, gold & valuables ‘missing’ from Guruvayur temple; key findings
content: Audits reveal alarming lapses in Guruvayur Devaswom's management of temple valuables, including gold, silver, and ivory. Poor recordkeeping and missing documentation have left precious assets vulnerable to misuse. Despite legal requirements, physical verification of valuables has been neglected for decades, raising concerns about accountability and potential misappropriation.

title: Diwali bonus row causes chaos on Agra-Lucknow Expressway; toll gates flung open
content: Toll gates on the Agra-Lucknow Expressway were opened by protesting workers demanding a higher Diwali bonus, causing thousands of vehicles to pass without payment. Police intervened, leading to discussions where the company agreed to a 10% salary hike, restoring operations after a two-hour disruption.

title: Punjab shocker: Ex-DGP, wife booked over son’s suspicious death; video sparks probe
content: Former Punjab DGP Mohammad Mustafa and his wife, ex-minister Razia Sultana, are among four booked by Haryana Police in connection with their son Akil Akhter's death. Akhter was found dead under suspicious circumstances, with social media posts alleging threats to his life. A Special Investigation Team has been formed to probe the matter.

title: 'Clear evidence attack was by Pakistan': ACB spokesperson on airstrike in Paktika
content: Afghanistan's cricket board has pulled out of a tri-series in Pakistan after accusing Islamabad of an airstrike that killed three Afghan cricketers.  The ACB spokesperson demanded global condemnation, citing evidence of Pakistani involvement.  National players reportedly support the withdrawal, with Zimbabwe replacing Afghanistan in the tournament.

title: Economic warning: JPMorgan CEO urges action; Says US too dependent on unreliable sources
content: JPMorgan Chase CEO Jamie Dimon is launching a $1.5 trillion, decade-long plan to bolster America's industrial strength and reduce foreign supply chain reliance.  The Security and Resiliency Initiative will target defense, frontier tech, energy, and advanced manufacturing, with the bank committing $10 billion to kickstart these vital sectors. Dimon urges immediate, unified action to secure the nation's future.

title: Sarfaraz misses out; Pant recovers to be named captain of India A vs South Africa A - complete squads
content: Rishabh Pant will lead the India A squad in two four-day matches against South Africa A. This marks Pant's return after recovering from a toe injury sustained in England. He was previously named in the Delhi Ranji Trophy squad but may miss that fixture. The matches are scheduled for October 30 and November 6 in Bengaluru.

title: Muhurat trading 2025: Nifty50 closes above 25,800; Sensex up nearly 63 points
content: Stock market today on Muhurat trading 2025: Indian equity benchmark indices, Nifty50 and BSE Sensex, opened in green for the one-hour special Diwali Muhurat trading session on Tuesday.

title: Delhi air pollution worsens: Tracking city’s AQI over 10 Diwalis; this year is just as toxic
content: Delhi residents woke to thick grey haze as air quality turned 'very poor' post-Diwali. Many burst firecrackers beyond the Supreme Court's limit. Pollution levels reached 'severe' in several areas. This follows a trend of poor air quality after Diwali celebrations in previous years, highlighting the impact of fireworks on existing pollution.

title: AI hiring: Startups rent luxury flats in San Francisco; Analysts ‘never seen anything like it’
content: AI startups in San Francisco are leasing luxury apartments for employees to combat the city's competitive housing market and attract top talent. This strategy goes beyond higher salaries, with some companies also offering rent stipends to encourage proximity to the office. The AI boom has significantly inflated rents, prompting these innovative housing solutions.

title: Why Rizwan was removed as Pakistan captain - shocking inside details
content: Pakistan wicketkeeper-batter Mohammad Rizwan has been removed as ODI captain, replaced by Shaheen Shah Afridi. Sources told TimesofIndia.com that Rizwan’s refusal to promote betting companies led to his ouster, despite his strong performances. Former captain Rashid Latif slammed the PCB, hinting at ideological bias, as Shaheen prepares to lead Pakistan against South Africa in Faisalabad.

title: IMD warns of heavy rain, thunderstorms & flood risk across several states
content: Southern and eastern India are bracing for a week of intense rainfall and thunderstorms, with the IMD predicting widespread showers and heavy downpours through October 26. Northeast monsoon activity is surging, prompting flash flood warnings for several districts in Tamil Nadu, Kerala, and Andhra Pradesh. Residents are urged to exercise caution.

title: AWS outage impact: McDonald’s, Microsoft, Apple Music, Alexa hit
content: A significant AWS outage on Monday, October 20, disrupted services for major companies like McDonald's, Microsoft Office 365, and Apple Music. The disruption stemmed from DNS issues affecting Amazon's DynamoDB database, impacting over 70 AWS services and highlighting cloud infrastructure fragility. Recovery efforts began in the afternoon, with services gradually returning online.

title: ‘Purification’ over namaz at Shaniwarwada: ASI officer files plaint against 3 women; NCP seeks action
content: BJP MP Medha Kulkarni faced strong criticism from NCP and Shiv Sena for protesting and 'purifying' Shaniwarwada after Muslim women offered namaz. The NCP demanded a police case against her, alleging she disturbed communal harmony. The incident led to police deployment at the historic site.

title: Fight erupts in Texans vs Seahawks as Stingley Jr. knocks off Smith-Njigba’s helmet
content: Tempers flared between the Texans and Seahawks as Derek Stingley Jr. was flagged for unnecessary roughness after knocking Jaxon Smith-Njigba's helmet off following an interception. The penalty shifted momentum, impacting the Texans' drive. This intense moment highlighted the high stakes and discipline challenges in a pivotal Week 7 matchup.

title: Hardik Pandya-Mahieka Sharma make it official? Diwali celebration wins the internet
content: Indian cricketer Hardik Pandya and model Mahieka Sharma have confirmed their relationship, appearing together at a Diwali celebration in coordinated red outfits. This public outing follows recent glimpses of their beach birthday getaway and airport sightings, putting an end to months of speculation about their romance.

title: Top picks for Samvat 2082: Muhurat trading today – 10 stocks for up to 38% returns
content: As India enters Samvat 2082, Motilal Oswal Financial Services analysts highlight a strong growth phase for Nifty earnings, projecting an 8% rise in FY26 and 16% in FY27. Muhurat Trading 2025 could signal market recovery, with the brokerage listing top stock picks like SBI, M&M, and BEL for potential gains up to 38%.

title: 'Only Congress will respect Nitish’: Pappu Yadav accuses BJP of isolating CM
content: Congress MP Pappu Yadav claims the BJP-led NDA is sidelining Bihar Chief Minister Nitish Kumar. He stated that only the Congress party will offer Kumar the respect he deserves. Yadav believes Kumar will not remain with the NDA after the upcoming Bihar elections. Bihar is scheduled to vote in November.

title: 'Adopt swadeshi, respect all languages': PM Modi’s letter to nation on Diwali; highlights achievements
content: Prime Minister Modi celebrated Deepavali, linking it to national progress and Lord Ram's ideals of justice. He highlighted the eradication of Naxalism in several districts and praised economic reforms like the GST Savings Festival. PM Modi emphasized India's rising global influence and urged citizens towards self-reliance and unity, inspired by the festival's spirit of shared light.

title: Bengaluru techie suicide scandal deepens: Ola Electric CEO booked; kin cite mysterious fund transfer
content: Ola Electric faces abetment to suicide charges after an engineer's death. His family alleges workplace humiliation and salary denial drove him to suicide, naming CEO Bhavish Aggarwal and a senior executive in an FIR. The company denies harassment claims, expressing condolences and pledging cooperation with the investigation.

title: Asrani's funeral: 'It was 'Sholay' star's wish to keep his last rites private'
content: Veteran actor and comedian Asrani ji has passed away, with his family honoring his wish for a private funeral. His last social media post was a Diwali greeting to fans. Asrani's family issued a statement mourning his irreparable loss to Hindi cinema and their hearts.

title: Japan gets new PM: Sanae Takaichi becomes first woman to hold top post
content: Sanae Takaichi made history as Japan's first female prime minister, securing victory in a parliamentary vote. Her election, following a coalition agreement, ends a political deadlock and is expected to bring stability. Takaichi, a conservative figure, is anticipated to pursue policies similar to former Prime Minister Shinzo Abe.

title: Orionid meteor shower peaks over US tonight: When and where to catch the blazing trails
content: Stargazers across the US are in for a treat as the Orionid meteor shower peaks tonight, offering up to 20 shooting stars hourly. Best viewed after midnight until dawn, this celestial spectacle is caused by debris from Halley's Comet.

title: Explained: $100K H-1B fee exempt for F-1 students; how to switch status
content: A new $100,000 fee for H-1B visa applications will impact new foreign applicants from September 21, 2025. USCIS confirms F-1 students in the United States are exempt when changing status. This allows international graduates to transition to professional roles without the significant cost. The fee targets overseas hires, not those already integrated into the US workforce.

title: Muhurat Trading 2025: Top stocks to buy in Samvat 2082 for up to 30% returns
content: As India celebrates Samvat 2082, LKP Securities unveils its top stock picks for Muhurat Trading, anticipating up to 30% gains. The brokerage highlights Bajaj Finance, Divi's Laboratories, FSN E-Commerce Ventures, Swiggy, State Bank of India, and SBI Cards, citing strong technical indicators and bullish chart patterns for these selections.

title: Rohit Sharma loses temper, yells at Shubman Gill - watch
content: New Indian captain Shubman Gill and Rohit Sharma struggled in the first ODI against Australia, with both openers dismissed early. A viral video resurfaced showing Rohit's frustration with Gill during a run-out mix-up in a previous match, highlighting the need for better coordination ahead of the crucial second ODI.

title: 'The contribution is not ... ': Ravi Shastri's comment on Rohit Sharma and Virat Kohli
content: Ravi Shastri believes Rohit Sharma and Virat Kohli's immense contributions over a decade will ensure their legacies remain intact, regardless of when they retire. The legendary duo recently returned to international cricket after stepping away from Tests and T20Is, but both had a quiet outing in their first ODI against Australia in Perth.

title: Scientists are still puzzled by sudden lights appearing on the Moon
content: For centuries, astronomers have observed Transient Lunar Phenomena (TLPs) – strange lights on the Moon. These enigmatic flashes and glows, possibly caused by meteoroid impacts or gas releases from the lunar interior, offer crucial insights into the Moon's geology and dynamic processes. Ongoing research aims to unravel their mysteries and enhance our understanding of Earth's closest celestial neighbor.

title: 'Eternal truth that good will always triumph': Trump wishes Americans on Diwali
content: President Donald Trump extended Diwali greetings, emphasizing its message of light over darkness and unity. He highlighted the festival as a time for families and friends to celebrate community, hope, and renewal. The observance is gaining official recognition across the US, with several states incorporating it into school calendars or as holidays.

title: Trouble in paradise! Sehwag's Diwali social post creates a stir: 'Where is...?'
content: Virender Sehwag's recent Diwali post featuring only his sons has sparked speculation about his marriage. Fans are questioning the absence of his wife, Aarti Sehwag, amidst reports of their separation after 20 years. The couple has remained silent on the rumors, while Sehwag's sons also appeared in Aarti's separate social media posts.

title: Gold price prediction: Where are prices headed in the near term?
content: Gold price prediction: Gold prices are expected to be volatile, with analysts advising investors to buy on dips rather than chase the rally. Despite easing trade tensions and bank concerns, gold saw a sharp rise, driven by ETF inflows and anticipation of Fed rate cuts. Silver also experienced a significant rally, with a similar 'buy the dip' strategy recommended.

title: Delhi air quality turns ‘Severe’ post-Diwali: Key precautions for residents & travelers
content: Delhi choked on severe smog post-Diwali, with the AQI soaring to 451 despite Supreme Court restrictions on firecrackers. Satellite towns also reported hazardous levels. Experts warn of extreme health risks, especially for vulnerable groups. Weather conditions are expected to prolong the smog, urging residents and travelers to take precautions.

title: How routine eye exams help detect cardiovascular problems early
content: Routine eye exams are now revealing early signs of heart disease. The retina's delicate blood vessels can show changes like narrowed vessels or 'eye strokes,' indicating potential cardiovascular risks. This non-invasive approach allows for earlier detection of conditions like high blood pressure and atherosclerosis, prompting crucial follow-up with doctors and potentially preventing serious heart events.

title: Trump's warning to China; seeks ‘fair deal’ amid tariff row
content: President Trump expressed optimism for a fair trade deal with China, despite his trade official accusing Beijing of "economic coercion." Trump highlighted his strong relationship with President Xi and upcoming meetings, while also warning of significant trouble for China if trade falters. The US also signed a critical minerals agreement with Australia to counter China's regional influence.

title: $100,000 H-1B visa fee: Who pays, who doesn’t? Trump admin clears the air amid confusion over policy
content: USCIS has detailed its $100,000 visa fee, requiring payment via a new portal for applicants to proceed. Notably, existing visa holders like F-1 students and L-1 professionals are exempt from this surcharge when changing status to H-1B. Exceptions are extremely rare, requiring Homeland Security's discretion for national interest cases.

title: Are BSE and NSE open for trading today? Check Muhurat trading details
content: Indian stock markets are set for a special Muhurat Trading session on Tuesday, October 21, 2025. This one-hour trading window marks the start of Samvat 2082, symbolizing prosperity. The National Stock Exchange and Bombay Stock Exchange will be closed for Diwali Laxmi Pujan on October 21 and Balipratipada on October 22.

title: 'Sholay' actor Asrani passes away: PM Modi remembers him as 'a gifted entertainer'
content: Veteran actor Asrani has passed away at 84. He died after a long illness. Prime Minister Narendra Modi and Union Home Minister Amit Shah have paid tribute. Asrani entertained millions with his performances. His family performed his last rites. He is survived by his wife, sister, and nephew. His legacy will be cherished.

title: Watch: Nakamura breaks down while talking about Naroditsky; American GM passes away
content: The chess world mourns Grandmaster Daniel Naroditsky's sudden death at 29. Naroditsky was a celebrated player and educator. He earned his Grandmaster title at 17. He was a top player in classical, rapid, and blitz chess. Naroditsky also built a large online following. His passing is a significant loss for competitive and online chess.

title: Diwali bank holidays 2025: When will banks be closed? Check state-wise schedule
content: Diwali celebrations in October 2025 will bring several bank holidays across India. Different states will observe closures on various days for festivals like Naraka Chaturdashi, Laxmi Puja, Govardhan Puja, and Bhai Dooj. Some regions will experience extended breaks. Customers can use digital banking services during these periods. Planning transactions in advance is recommended.

title: 'Don't argue': Virat Kohli receives a tough message after Perth duck
content: Former Australian cricketer Matthew Hayden advised Virat Kohli to avoid overthinking and self-arguments after a duck in the first ODI against Australia. Hayden expressed faith in Kohli's exceptional technique and experience, emphasizing his destructive potential with clarity. India pacer Arshdeep Singh also defended Kohli, calling form a mere word for the seasoned batter.

title: Watch: Bulldozers move in as part of White House razed; Trump set to build grand ballroom
content: Construction has begun on President Trump's new 90,000-square-foot ballroom, involving the demolition of the East Wing of the White House. This significant renovation, one of the largest in decades, aims to nearly double the building's size. The project, funded in part by corporate executives, has raised ethics concerns regarding donor access.

title: ‘Never trust an Indian’: Racist, pro-Nazi chat by Trump nominee leaked
content: Leaked chats reveal Paul Ingrassia, Trump's nominee for Special Counsel, made deeply offensive remarks. He disparaged MLK Jr. Day, used racial slurs, and admitted to a "Nazi streak." Ingrassia also expressed views on race and leadership that drew sharp criticism from chat participants, sparking serious debate.

title: Mohsin Naqvi plays musical chairs: Third Pakistan captaincy change in 12 months
content: Shaheen Shah Afridi has been appointed Pakistan's new ODI captain for the upcoming series against South Africa, marking the third leadership change in the format within a year. He takes over from Mohammad Rizwan, who led the team to several series wins before facing challenges in 2025, including a significant defeat in the West Indies.

title: Harvard Professor On Viksit Bharat 2047 Goal, Producing Science Prodigies
content: Substantial investment in science is key to becoming a developed society, Harvard professor Tarun Khanna said while speaking about India's Viksit Bharat 2047 goal.

title: Non-Hindu Couples Must Use Juvenile Justice Act for Legal Adoptions: Court
content: The Madras High Court has held that Muslim and Christian couples cannot directly register adoption deeds, and must instead follow the Juvenile Justice Act, offering a clear legal route for non-Hindu families to to adopt children lawfully.

title: Global Race Is On To Secure Critical Minerals. Why Do They Matter So Much?
content: Critical minerals are the raw materials used to manufacture objects like mobile phones, wind turbines and weapons. They underpin the technologies of the next industrial age, from lithium-ion batteries to F-35 fighter jets.

title: US Man Who Faked Death, Fled To UK, Jailed For Raping Ex-Girlfriend In 2008
content: Nicholas Rossi, 38, went to great lengths to conceal his identity and flee after committing the rape in the western state of Utah in 2008.

title: Education, Unemployment: What Bihar's Youth Want From Its Next Government
content: College students in poll-bound Bihar, many of whom are first-time voters, rue the lack of job opportunities that has been forcing several of their seniors to leave the state in search of work.

title: In Telangana, KCR's Party Alleges Expired Medicines Distributed To Patients
content: In a shocking discovery during a recent inspection conducted by BRS Official Spokesperson Manne Krishank at the Rasoolpura Basti Dawakhana, it was revealed that patients were being administered medicines that had expired three months ago.

title: Strapless Dress, Bare Head: Iran's Pro-Hijab Leader Under Fire After Daughter's Wedding Video Goes Viral
content: Iran's hardline Islamic regime, led by Supreme Leader Ayatollah Ali Khamenei, is embroiled in a type of scandal seldom seen in the Islamic Republic.

title: Sanae Takaichi, Japan's 1st Woman PM, Names Just 2 Women In Her Cabinet
content: Sanae Takaichi had said last month that the gender balance in her cabinet and the executive committee of her ruling party "will be comparable to those of Nordic countries".

title: "Big Win For India, UPI, Aadhaar Models Used In Many Nations": Ashwini Vaishnaw At NDTV World Summit
content: Union IT and Railways Minister Ashwini Vaishnaw has said that India's digital architectures are being endorsed and embraced globally, with at least 13 countries adopting the Unified Payments Interface (UPI).

title: 'Supreme Court Chose Right To Burn Crackers Over Right To Live': Amitabh Kant
content: Amitabh Kant, Sherpa of the 2023 G20 Summit in India and former CEO of Centre's think tank NITI Aayog, has said Delhi's air quality "lies in shambles" and only "ruthless and sustained execution" of pollution control can save Delhi

title: Man Stabbed To Death After Argument Over Bursting Firecrackers In Delhi
content: Three men were arrested for allegedly stabbing a man to death after beating him following a dispute over bursting firecrackers in outer north Delhi's Shahbad Dairy in the early hours of Tuesday, police said.

title: Ex-Top Cop's Son Who Died Last Week Alleged Father-Wife Affair, Then Denied
content: A former Punjab minister and her husband, a former top cop, have been charged with the murder of their son, days after the 33-year-old son was found dead under mysterious circumstances

title: AAP Mocks Rekha Gupta Over Delhi Pollution, BJP Blames Citizens, Farm Fires
content: AAP MLA Gopal Rai accused the Delhi government of "making excuses" and not taking action to prevent the pollution.

title: Bengaluru Doctor Arrested For Allegedly Harassing Woman At Clinic
content: The woman, in her police complaint, said she had gone to Dr Praveen's clinic on October 18 to consult him regarding a skin infection.

title: 2 Killed, 2 Injured As Speeding Jeep Crashes Into Motorcycles In Bhopal
content: Two persons were killed and as many others injured when a speeding jeep collided with two motorcycles in Madhya Pradesh capital Bhopal, police said on Tuesday.

title: Amazon Outage: Computer Scientist Explains Why 'Cloud' Needs To Change
content: The worlds largest cloud computing platform, Amazon Web Services (AWS), has experienced a major outage that has impacted thousands of organisations, including banks, financial software platforms such as Xero, and social media platforms like Snapchat

title: Medieval Europe Saw Madhya Pradesh As World's Centre: Nick Booker At NDTV World Summit
content: Medieval Europeans once considered Ujjain, in present-day Madhya Pradesh, the centre of the world for their astronomical calculations, IndoGenius co-founder Nick Booker has said.

title: Breathing Issues, Irritation In Eyes: Delhi Complains As Air Quality Dips
content: A day after Diwali, Delhi woke up to thick and heavy layer of smog as the air quality deteriorated to the 'Very Poor' category on Tuesday morning, with most of the monitoring stations marked in the 'Red Zone' of pollution.

title: No Diwali Bonus, Agra-Lucknow Expressway Toll Operators Open Gates For All
content: Thousands of vehicles passed the Fatehabad toll plaza on the Agra-Lucknow Expressway without paying a toll on Sunday after employees went on a strike and opened the gates for free movement, over the denial of a Diwali bonus.

title: Women Offer Namaz At Pune Fort, BJP MP 'Purifies' Area With Cow Urine
content: The incident at the fort reportedly took place on Saturday, following which an Archaeological Survey of India (ASI) officer filed a complaint with Pune City Police.

title: Verstappen has turned predictable McLaren duel into thrilling three-way title fight
content: Max Verstappen becomes the first driver to win seven races in the united states . he is within 40 points of championship leader Oscar Piastri with five races and two sprints to go . the 2025 season is a three-way fight .

title: Lions knock Bucs out of first in NFC behind Gibbs' big night
content: Detroit running back Jahmyr Gibbs scores 78 yards in 24-9 win over the Tampa Bay Buccaneers . the Lions are now 13-4 after a loss since the start of the 2022 campaign . despite playing without starting safeties Kerby Joseph (knee) and Brian Branch (suspension)

title: From LeBron golfing to Jokic's horse, relive the NBA offseason through social media
content: the 2025-26 offseason kicks off on tuesday, marking the beginning of on-court storylines . the biggest names made the most of their offseason . this summer had an open schedule, meaning more time to hit the road .

title: Projecting the CFP top 12 after Week 8: Big move for Bama
content: the 13 members of the college football playoff selection committee will meet for two days . they're going to meet at the Gaylord Texan Resort in Grapevine, Texas . the committee will do their own mock ranking to help the new members better understand the process .

title: 🏈 College Football Power Rankings: Bama rises
content: Georgia quarterback Gunner Stockton delivers in a big moment once again in the win over the Rebels . the bulldogs are gaining steam in the college football playoff race . a team of top players is gaining momentum in college football .

title: Spent Rs 66k, Pune farmer gets Rs 664 for 7.5 quintals of rain-hit onions
content: Sudam Ingle received just Rs 664 for 7.5 quintals of onions this season . he spent another Rs 1,500 to pack and transport it to the Purandar market yard for sale on friday . his story is echoed across farmlands where relentless rains and collapsing prices have left farmers struggling .

title: Rink report: Matthew Schaefer's hot start, Tusky's debut, games of the week
content: no. 1 draft pick has had quite the debut in the NHL, hasn't he? he started his NHL career with a five-game point streak (and counting) that's the second-longest point streak by any defenseman from the start of their career .
